name: A Shorter Hike
description:
How to play: EDSF to move
Spacebar to jump, climb and glide Mouse to look around

This game is a demake of the fantastic game A Short Hike by Adam Robinson-Yu. I got sick right in the middle of the jam, so 50% of the work was done in the last 24 hours or so. That's also why there's no menu or tutorial!

Music by Major Bruno

Models, SFX, Art, Game Design and Programming done by Safir
